alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Davidson, western Sumner and eastern Robertson Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ridgetop, or 9 miles south of Springfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Springfield, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Joelton, Orlinda, Whites Creek and Cottontown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 95 and 118. Interstate 24 between mile markers 32 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
